Key Match Events: Houston overcame a 20-point first quarter to rout the short-handed Washington Wizards 135-112
Jalen Green scored 22 of his 29 points in the third quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: Washington's 18 turnovers led to 35 Houston points, the most a Wizards opponent has scored directly from giveaways this season
Others: Corey Kispert scored 23 points and Jonas Valanciunas added 18 in the Wizards' third straight defeat
Houston Rockets head coach Ime Udoka looks on during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the Washington Wizards
Washington Wizards head coach Brian Keefe looks on during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the Houston Rockets
